data.name: chkEnableSingleFileDownload.Text
data.value: Allow Single File Download

data.name: lblTemplateSamples.Text
data.value:
File List Item Display Template Samples - Provided to give you an idea on how you can customize the look of your file listing
<b><a href="[VIEWLINK]">[TITLE]</a></b><br><i><font size="1">[DATEPUBLISHED]</font></i><br>
<font size="1">[PREMIUMIMAGE]([VIEWCOUNTIMAGE] Views) [TOTALVOTES] Votes    Comments: [TOTALCOMMENTS]</font>
<br>[SUMMARY]<br><a href="[VIEWLINK]">View Complete Details and Download Options</a>
[PREMIUMIMAGE][QUICKADDTOBUNDLE] - <a href="[VIEWLINK]">[TITLE]</a>

data.name: lblTemplateTags.Text
data.value:
Token Description
[RATINGIMAGE] Displays a Thumb-Up Image or a Thumb-Down image based on the current votes.
[PREMIUMIMAGE] Displays an image indicating if the entry is a "Premium" or "Priority" listing.
[TOTALCOMMENTS] Displayes the total number of comments for the entry.
[TOTALVOTES] Displays the total number of postive and negative votes for the entry.
[VIEWCOUNTIMAGE] Displays the View Count Image
[COMMENTS] Displays the Comments for the current entry.
[TITLELINK] Displays the Title of the entry as a clickable link that will open the entry detail screen.
[VIEWLINK] Displays the URL to open the File, can be used to create your own hyperlink tag
[INSTANTDOWNLOAD] Downloads the first file in the group instantly without going to checkout
[DATEPUBLISHED] Displays the date the entry was published
[TITLE] Displays the Title of the entry
[SUMMARY] Displays the Summary of the entry
[BODY] Displays the Body of the entry
[DATEAPPROVED] Displays the date the entry was approved
[DATECREATED] Displays the date the entry was created
[EMAILCOUNT] Displays the total number of emails sent for the entry
[DATEMODIFIED] Displays the date the entry was last modified
[KEYWORDS] Displays the Key Words for the entry
[LASTVIEWDATE] Displays the last time the entry detail was viewed.
[NEGATIVERATINGS] Displays the total negative ratings for the entry
[POSITIVERATINGS] Displays the total positive ratings for the entry
[PREMIUM] Displays True or False for the Premium (Priority) status of the entry
[VIEWCOUNT] Displays the total times the entry detail was viewed
[ARCHIVEDDATE] Displays the archive date for the entry
[CREATEDBYUSERNAME] Displays the user name of the person that created the entry
[CREATEDBYUSERID] Displays the User ID of the person that created the entry
[CREATEDBYDISPLAYNAME] Displays the display name of the person that created the entry
[CREATEDBYEMAIL] Displays the email address of the person that created the entry
[CREATEDBYFIRSTNAME] Displays the first name of the person that created the entry
[CREATEDBYLASTNAME] Displays the last name of the person that created the entry
[QUICKADDTOBUNDLE] (Master List Only) Displays an image that when clicked will add all files related to the entry to the current users Bundle
